ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: This manuscript was edited by Wallace Academic Editing. The authors are grateful to all our colleagues in the Department of Medical Records in Tri-Service General Hospital for their help in the collection of government data. We would like to thank Su-Chuen Lin for assistance in data entry. We also would like to thank Hong-Ling Lin, Yu-Jui Chen, and Jui-Cheng Lu for technical assistance.
